mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (title, state, selling_area_id, seller_id, price, like_count, is_negotiation, content, category_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{state}, #{sellingAreaId}, #{sellerId}, #{price}, #{likeCount}, #{isNegotiation}, #{content}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM products p JOIN areas a ON p.selling_area_id = a.id WHERE (#{category} = '1' OR p.category_id = #{category}) AND (#{lastProductId} IS NULL OR p.id < #{lastProductId}) AND ST_Distance_Sphere(a.geo_point, (SELECT geo_point FROM areas WHERE id = #{areaId})) < ${distance} ORDER BY p.id DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likes (user_id, type_id, type, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{typeId}, #{type}, #{createdAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE type_id=#{productId} AND user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE products SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id}
